name: Super 21
overview:
Skee Ball’s Super 21 arcade game captures the glamour and the excitement of a blackjack table on the casino floor but as an arcade redemption title!

This is a quick coin skill game where players must time their coin drop to reach 21 (Blackjack) points. Below the coin mechanism is a constantly spinning wheel that has notches and a playing card value assigned to each. Capture the points by simply landing a coin into the notch. The closer the player gets to 21 without going over, the more tickets they win! Players who get Blackjack with only two cards, wins the big progressive ticket jackpot prize!
